transcript: the more I learn about sales the more I think it's literally just clear communication and I think most people don't know how to communicate well they say words they don't know how to define and they say to people who also don't know the definition of the word and both people are just making noise with their faces at one another not understanding one another all the complex stuff that people talk all these like techniques that is absolutely the 5% of what matters in sales and the 95% of it is just learning how to communicate it will no longer be the constraint of your career if you just learn how to communicate well
